title: Bug 12906[Editor Mgmt] If file is already opened in one editor, cannot open in another editor (should give error msg)
description: Bug 12906[Editor Mgmt] If file is already opened in one editor, cannot open in another editor (should give error msg)
OB: When a file is already open in one editor, there is no error message displayed when attempting to open the same file in another editor.
EB: However, there should be a warning or error message displayed when attempting to open a file in an editor that is already open in another editor.
SR:
1. Open a file in one editor.
2. Try to open the same file in another editor.
3. Observe that no error or warning message is displayed even though the file is already open in another editor.
